block AutomobileWheelAssembly {
  part: WheelBearingUnit
  part: Tire
  part: Bead[2]
  part: Hub
  part: Rim[2]
  part: BoltMountingHole[*]
  part: ThreadedHole[*]
  part: Bolt[*]

  Tire.seal()
  Tire.fasten(Bead[0], Rim[0])
  Tire.fasten(Bead[1], Rim[1])

  BoltMountingHole.connect(ThreadedHole, Bolt)

  Hub.connect(BoltMountingHole)
  Tire.connect(Rim)
}
```

block VehicleA {
  part VehicleController
  part System

  System : block {
    state Off
    state Starting
    state Running
    state HealthManagement
    state Maintenance
    state Degraded

    transition Off -> Starting :
      trigger startSignal
      guard brakePressed

    transition Starting -> Running :
      trigger vehicleOnSignal

    transition Running -> Off :
      effect applyParkingBrake
      effect powerOff

    transition Running -> Degraded :
      guard temperature > safetyThreshold
      effect sendOverTemperatureSignal

    transition Degraded -> Maintenance :
      trigger restoreToNormalSignal

    transition Maintenance -> Normal :
      trigger restoreToNormalSignal
  }

  VehicleController : block {
    state Off
    state Running

    transition Off -> Running :
      trigger startSignal

    transition Running -> Off :
      trigger shutdownSignal
  }
}
```

  part Transmission

  part RearAxleAssembly

    description = "Users can input quality data for each component."

    description = "The system will automatically aggregate and calculate the total mass of the vehicle."

  requirement AutomaticAnalysisTaskGeneration :
    description = "Based on set analysis objectives, it can automatically generate analysis tasks and plans."

  requirement ComprehensiveEvaluation :
    description = "The system achieves comprehensive evaluation for vehicle quality."

  requirement RequirementsTracking :
    description = "The system provides requirements tracking for vehicle quality."

  requirement ScientificSupport :
    description = "The system provides scientific support for vehicle design and performance optimization."

  requirement DevelopmentEfficiencyImprovement

block UnitSystemLibrary {
  part ISQ
  part USCustomaryUnits
  requirement "Support interoperability and adaptation between ISQ and USCustomaryUnits"
  requirement "Enable users to conveniently manage, convert, and apply various units of physical quantities"
  requirement "Ensure the accuracy and authoritative standardization of all unit types"
  requirement "Enhance the efficiency and reliability of data processing and communication"
}

```
block PubSubSystem {
  part Server
  part Producer
  part Consumer

  Server.publishPort : blockPort
  Server.subscribePort : blockPort
  Producer.publishPort : blockPort
  Consumer.subscribePort : blockPort

  Server.publishPort <-> Producer.publishPort : flow
  Server.subscribePort <-> Consumer.subscribePort : flow

  Server.publishPort.publish(message) : operation
  Server.subscribePort.subscribe(topic) : operation
  Producer.publishPort.publish(message, topic) : operation
  Consumer.subscribePort.receive(message) : operation

  Server.publishPort.publish(message) -> Server.subscribePort.receive(message) : flow
  Producer.publishPort.publish(message, topic) -> Server.publishPort.publish(message) : flow
  Server.subscribePort.subscribe(topic) -> Server.subscribePort.receive(message) : flow
  Server.subscribePort.receive(message) -> Consumer.subscribePort.receive(message) : flow
}
``

block SceneCaptureSystem {
  part User
  part Camera
  part SceneSelection
  part AutoFocus
  part ImageCapture
  part ImageOutput

  User.selects(SceneSelection)
  SceneSelection.selects(Camera)
  Camera.focuses(AutoFocus)
  AutoFocus.generates(IntermediateImage)
  Camera.captures(ImageCapture)
  ImageCapture.outputs(ImageOutput)
  User.obtains(ImageOutput)
}
```

block PhotographyWorkflowSystem {
  part SceneSelection
  part FocusingProcess
  part ShootingProcess
  part Image
  part FinalPhotograph

  SceneSelection -> FocusingProcess : selects
  FocusingProcess -> Image : generates
  Image -> ShootingProcess : uses
  ShootingProcess -> FinalPhotograph : produces

  SceneSelection -> FocusingProcess : automatic
  FocusingProcess -> ShootingProcess : automatic
  ShootingProcess -> FinalPhotograph : automatic

  SceneSelection -> FinalPhotograph : convenience
  ShootingProcess -> FinalPhotograph : quality
}
This SysML v2 textual code defines a block diagram for a Photography Workflow System. The system consists of five parts: SceneSelection, FocusingProcess, ShootingProcess, Image, and FinalPhotograph. The relationships between these parts are also defined. The SceneSelection part selects a specific scene, which is then used by the FocusingProcess part to generate an image. This image is then used by the ShootingProcess part to produce a final

block PhotographySystem {
  part User
  part Scene
  part Image
  part Photograph

  User -> Scene : provides
  Scene -> Image : focusProcessing
  Image -> Photograph : shootingOperation

  User -> Photograph : obtains
}
```

block PhotographyWorkflow {
  part Scene
  part Image
  part Picture
  part Focus
  part Shoot
  Scene -> Focus : input
  Focus -> Image : output
  Image -> Shoot : input
  Shoot -> Picture : output
}
```

block PhotographyWorkflow {
  part Camera
  part FocusFunction
  part ShootingOperation
  part Display

  Camera.focusFunction = FocusFunction
  Camera.shootingOperation = ShootingOperation
  Camera.display = Display

  operation takePhoto() {
    Camera.acquireScene()
    FocusFunction.focus(Camera.scene)
    ShootingOperation.shoot(FocusFunction.focusedImage)
    Display.show(ShootingOperation.photo)
  }
}
```

block CameraSystem {
  part Camera
  part Display
  flow SceneInput
  flow Focusing
  flow ImageGeneration
  flow PhotoDisplay
  requirement "The system shall implement basic camera shooting and display functionality."
  requirement "The system shall perform a focusing process on the scene to obtain an image."
  requirement "The system shall capture the obtained image to generate a photo."
  requirement "The system shall automatically display the captured photo on the screen."
  requirement "The user shall be able to view the shooting result immediately."
  requirement "The entire process shall ensure that scene processing, image generation, and photo display are seamlessly and automatically integrated."
  requirement "The user shall only need to perform a simple shooting operation to obtain a complete experience of photographing and viewing the result."
  SceneInput -> Focusing
  Focusing -> ImageGeneration
  ImageGeneration -> PhotoDisplay
  PhotoDisplay -> Display
  Camera -> ImageGeneration
  ImageGeneration -> Camera
}
```

block VehicleSimulationSystem {
  part Vehicle
  part Environment
  part TimeStep
  part AerodynamicDragCoefficient
  part RollingResistanceCoefficient
  part WheelEndOutputPower
  part TotalVehicleMass
  part InitialSpeed
  part InitialPosition
  part AvailableDrivingPower
  part Acceleration
  part NewSpeed
  part NewPosition

  flow CalculateAvailableDrivingPower {
    source Environment
    source AerodynamicDragCoefficient
    source RollingResistanceCoefficient
    source TotalVehicleMass
    source InitialSpeed
    target AvailableDrivingPower
  }

  flow CalculateAcceleration {
    source AvailableDrivingPower
    source WheelEndOutputPower
    source TotalVehicleMass
    target Acceleration
  }

  flow CalculateNewSpeed {
    source InitialSpeed
    source Acceleration
    source TimeStep
    target NewSpeed
  }

  flow CalculateNewPosition {
    source InitialPosition
    source InitialSpeed
    source Acceleration
    source Time

block TransportationSystem {
  part Driver
  part Passenger[0..4]
  part Vehicle
  part GasStation
  part StartingPoint
  part Destination

  Driver.operates(Vehicle)
  Driver.exits(Vehicle)
  Passenger.enters(Vehicle)
  Passenger.exits(Vehicle)
  Vehicle.refuels(GasStation)

  Driver.travels(StartingPoint, Destination)
  Passenger.travels(StartingPoint, Destination)

  constraint SimpleInteractions :
    forAll interactions : Interaction |
      interactions.isSimple() and interactions.isConvenient()

  requirement DailyTransportation :
    ensure Driver.isSafelyTransported(StartingPoint, Destination)
    ensure Passenger.isSafelyTransported(StartingPoint, Destination)
}
```

block Equipment {
  part Battery
  requirement "Monitor battery level during operation"
  requirement "Detect battery aging and identify risk"
  requirement "Determine low battery state when level falls below threshold"
  requirement "Analyze low battery state and shut down device if necessary"
  requirement "Assign severity level for high-level failures"
  requirement "Alert users and maintenance personnel for timely intervention"
  requirement "Ensure reliable operation of equipment and normal usage needs of user"
}
```
